verses.verse: False balances are a disgusting thing to Jehovah, but a perfect stone His delight.
Pride comes, then shame comes, but with those being humble is wisdom.
The integrity of the upright ones guides them, but the perverting of those betraying will devastate them.
Wealth does not profit in the day of wrath, but righteousness delivers from death.
The righteousness of the sound one shall make his way right, but the wicked one shall fall by his own wickedness.
The righteousness of the upright one shall deliver them, but those betraying shall be taken in their lust.
In the death of a wicked man his expectation shall perish, and the hope of doers of iniquity shall be lost.
The righteous one is delivered from distress, and the wicked one goes in instead of him.
The godless one is corrupting his friend with his mouth, but the righteous ones are delivered by knowledge.
When the righteous ones receive good things, the city rejoices; and at perishing of the wicked ones is singing.
A city is lifted up by the blessing of the upright one, but by the mouth of the wicked ones it is overthrown.
One despising his friend lacks heart, but an understanding man remains silent.
One going with slander is a revealer of secrets, but the faithful of spirit keeps a matter hidden.
In the absence of wise counsels the people fall, but safety is in a great counselor.
The evil one suffers when he is surety for a stranger, but one hating strikers of hands is trusted.
A gracious woman holds to honor, but terrifying men hold to riches.
A merciful man does good to his own soul, but the cruel one troubles his own flesh.
The wicked one makes a wage of falsehood, but one sowing righteousness has a reward of truth.
As righteousness is to life, even the evil one is pursuing to his death.
The perverse of heart is a disgusting thing to Jehovah, but His delight is the blameless one of his way.
Though hand join to hand, the evil one shall not be free from guilt, but the seed of the righteous ones escapes.
As a ring of gold in a swine's snout, so is a woman who is beautiful, yet turning aside discretion.
The desire of the righteous ones is only good, the hope of the wicked ones is wrath.
There is one who scatters yet increases more, but a withholder of uprightness comes only to poverty.
The soul of blessing will be made fat; he drinking to his fill will also be taught.
One holding back grain, the people curse him; but a blessing is to the head of one selling grain.
One seeking good early seeks favor; but one pursuing an evil thing, it shall come to him.
One trusting in his riches, he shall fall; but like a green leaf the righteous ones shall flourish.
One troubling his house inherits the wind; and the foolish one is servant to the wise of heart.
The fruit of the righteous one is a tree of life, and one taking souls is wise.
Behold, the righteous ones shall be rewarded in the earth; also indeed the wicked one and the sinner.
